question: 運
sourceMnemonic: This takes the <kanji>luck</kanji> meaning from the kanji. Think of it this way: If you're "carrying" you're going to create your own luck. Now nobody will mess with you, kanji gangstah. You carry guns and have a ton of <vocabulary>luck</vocabulary> because of it.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji! How... shall I say... <vocabulary>luck</vocabulary>-filled?
